name: CNN
text:
New CDC guidelines address how schools can work with public health officials if an infected person has been on campus.

Rather than immediately shutting down, the guidelines say one option is an initial short-term class suspension & cancellation of events. https://t.co/2qSbVWKTTw

name: CNN
text: Researchers at a UK university have "digitally unwrapped" three mummified animals from ancient Egypt using high-resolution 3D scans https://t.co/3hWhPeAm7w https://t.co/Mm2k5g1SA9
